title: What songs do you play on a repeat mode as of September 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Exile Taylor Swift Rare by selens gomez whole Album except fun and boyfriend Perfect by Selena Gomez Breathin by Ariana Grande Say so by Doja cat
Addicted to Free The Frail by JPEGMAFIA and Jet Black by Anderson Paak atm. Also for songs this year i’ve been bumping Tokyo Love Hotel by Rina Sawayma, it’s a treat for pop fans.
